text: The 40 - year - old turned agony aunt to help out Gabi Dunn who revealed that she had just split up with her boyfriend, just days after her prom. Instead of wasting her prom photos, the teenager decided to photoshop her favourite actor into the photos and send them to Mr Reynolds. “ My boyfriend and I broke up a few days after prom, so I decided to ‘ edit ’ the photos a little @ VancityReynolds, ” she tweeted.
